alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 8:34PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Clay and central Fillmore Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 833 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Saronville, or 26 miles east of Hastings, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shickley, Geneva and Strang. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central Nebraska.
